an5.213:4.1: * “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati.
an5.213:4.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.213:5.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—
an5.213:6.2: yadi khattiyaparisaṃ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ, yadi gahapatiparisaṃ, yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—
an5.213:6.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
an5.213:7.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5.213:8.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:8.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:9.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati.
an5.213:9.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.213:10.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—
an5.213:11.2: yadi khattiyaparisaṃ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ, yadi gahapatiparisaṃ, yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—
an5.213:11.4: Ayaṃ bhikkhave, tatiyo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
an5.213:12.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5.213:13.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:13.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti.
